node.description: Large rocks lie tumbled on the stone floor, which is covered in a fine layer of grit. The walls have gouges where the rocks have been torn out, whether by natural settling of the earth or by a conscious effort is hard to tell. The sound of trickling water echoes from the northeast.

node.name: Ker'Leor, Gelvitaen Almi
node.description: A trickle of fresh water seeps through the piled rubble of a long-ago rockfall. Hints of fresh air drift through the stones, but the way east is decidedly blocked.

node.name: Ker'Leor, Gelvitaen Almi
node.description: Water drips somewhere nearby, but the floor in this part of the tunnels is even and dry. The thick stone walls with their rough surfaces make sound move strangely, and a scream would carry its own weight through the corridors. From the northwest comes a low hum, more felt than heard.

node.name: Ker'Leor, Gelvitaen Almi
node.description: Running water echoes from somewhere in the tunnels, along with strange scraping noises. The grey stone walls divulge nothing, lowering flat and rough over the uneven floor.

node.name: Ker'Leor, Gelvitaen Almi
node.description: A pair of thick iron chains suspended from the ceiling are bracketed to the west wall, and from there hang to the floor, ending in an empty pair of manacles. Small rodents scurrying over the metal into cracks in the walls cause the chains to rub the stone in a distinctive, teeth-clenching scrape. Hints of gold in the wall, knee-high to a Dwarf, catch the eye. From the northeast comes a low vibration through the stone.

node.name: Ker'Leor, Zindalyi Lyba
node.description: A rough chunk of stone rises from the floor as though it grew from the mountains themselves. Closer inspection reveals careful chiseling and subtle carving to create a flat-topped altar. This part of the tunnel is hushed, the stone floor clean, the walls spotless, but thrums with power. Someone -- or something -- keeps the altar in good repair. Small bits of bone and feathers are arranged behind the altar, holding meaning known only to those who laid them there.

A rough chunk of stone with careful chiseling and subtle carving is kept in good repair. Small bits of bone and feathers are arranged behind the altar, holding meaning known only to those who laid them there.

node.name: Ker'Leor, Haleer Lyba
node.description: The twisting tunnels are disorienting, spiraling through the dark like a demented seashell. Air stirs sullenly as you pass, bringing the fresh reek of decay to brush against your face.

node.name: Ker'Leor, Haleer Lyba
node.description: Tattered clothing lies mostly buried in the muck of the floor, wedged against the rough walls. A few forlorn bells chime when water drips from the ceiling onto the befouled heap, and a mocking laugh echoes through the tunnels in response.

node.name: Ker'Leor, Handsome Plateau
node.description: Chunks of shale are packed within the greyish dirt of the plateau. Dropped and crushed fruits create an organic trail from the northern trees to the southern clearing, their loamy odor wafting upward from the otherwise dry ground.

node.name: Fornsted, Chapel
node.description: The chapel is built of fine-grained deobar wood. The predominant feature is an altar of polished alabaster, a bronze lion depicted on the front in tile mosaic. Poised above the altar is a luminous gold and jade cobra with emerald eyes, its silver tongue forking between sharp fangs. A few candelabra are scattered about the room, illuminating the cherrywood benches facing the front of the chapel.

The predominant feature is an altar of polished alabaster, a bronze lion depicted on the front in tile mosaic. Poised above the altar is a luminous gold and jade cobra with emerald eyes, its silver tongue forking between sharp fangs.

node.name: Old Skasaarn's House
node.description: This low-ceilinged house exemplifies, above all else, practicality. Scorning all form of luxury and convenience, the town's oldest resident subsists on an uncomfortable looking pallet with a pile of rocks in one corner serving as a makeshift altar. A starched cloth spread out on the stone floor fills in for a table. The only other decoration is a carved stone case near the pallet.

node.name: The Suncatcher
node.description: The Suncatcher barge is made up of a wooden flatboat mounted atop steel rails. An elevated platform at the front of the craft is used by the team of Sand Elves that sail it through the desert ocean by controlling the team of massive yeehars that pull it. The barge itself is full of coils of rope, wooden crates and barrels, and bulging sackcloth.

node.name: Velaka Desert, Beneath the Dry Dock
node.description: To the west, the barren landscape of the Velaka Desert takes on the appearance of a painting, framed on the top and sides by the aged wood of the dry dock and its supports. A seemingly endless sea of crescent-shaped dunes stretches forth, blocking the horizon almost immediately from view. The dock itself stands partially submerged in the base of the first slope, a lone scout of an ever-encroaching army of sand.

node.name: Ker'Leor, Gallows Gather
node.description: Thick as syrup, the smell of death oozes in from the east, where the gloom is almost impenetrable. The creak of branches rubbing against each other suggests that more trees lie that way. When the wind gusts from the west, laughter echoes in this clearing from something malign, though it could just be the way the wind whistles through the area. The copse of trees shrinks away from a carved stake in the ground.

node.name: Ker'Leor, Gallows Woods
node.description: Ancient trees claw at the sky, black with decay and a nearly tangible reek of haunting. Bodies in various states of decomposition hang impaled on the spear-like branches, as if some mighty evil had placed them there.
Thick gloom clouds the air, obscuring vision and lending the appearance of dark shadows hanging limply in the branches overhead.

node.name: Ker'Leor, Gallows Woods
node.description: Ancient trees claw at the sky, black with decay and a nearly tangible reek of haunting. Bodies in various states of decomposition hang impaled on the spear-like branches, as if some mighty evil had placed them there.

node.name: Ker'Leor, Gallows Woods
node.description: Ancient trees claw at the sky, black with decay and a nearly tangible reek of haunting. Bodies in various states of decomposition hang impaled on the spear-like branches, as if some mighty evil had placed them there.

node.name: Ker'Leor, Gallows Woods
node.description: Ancient trees claw at the sky, black with decay and a nearly tangible reek of haunting. Bodies in various states of decomposition hang impaled on the spear-like branches, as if some mighty evil had placed them there.

node.name: Ker'Leor, Gallows Woods
node.description: Ancient trees claw at the sky, black with decay and a nearly tangible reek of haunting. Bodies in various states of decomposition hang impaled on the spear-like branches, as if some mighty evil had placed them there.

node.name: Arnshal Keep, Dungeon
node.description: Eerie noises waft throughout the dungeon. Chains rattle, rats squeak, and occasionally a muffled groan or a scream of pain lances down the dark corridors. Throughout it all, the ever-present noise of water dripping steadily echoes.

node.name: Arnshal Keep, Dungeon
node.description: The dank black hallway is filled with the foul stenches of sweat and dried blood, and the musty lingering odor of mildew. Thick iron bars lead to cramped cells with straw-covered floors of cold rock, tiny and half-rotted wooden cots the only furniture.

node.name: Arnshal Keep, Dungeon
node.description: The long hallway is lit only by a single flickering reed torch hanging from the black wall. The musky atmosphere could almost have been taken directly from a deep bog, as a cloud of fog hangs in the air along with the fumes of water tinged with blood, urine, and rust.

node.name: Arnshal Keep, Dungeon
node.description: The rows of iron barred cells are interrupted here by an impenetrable steel door. Thick though it may be, the sounds of weeping or the harsh snap of a whip cracking escape from the sealed chamber beyond every now and then.

node.name: Arnshal Keep, Dungeon
node.description: The bleached white bones of a human skeleton are held prisoner inside a tiny cell, its lifeless arm held to the wall in iron manacles. Rats skitter back and forth around the inanimate inmate, prying at the departed's dessicated remains.

node.name: Arnshal Keep, Cell
node.description: The floor, made of cold, hard, and rough rock, is covered by a straw pallet. Iron manacles hang from the walls, and the rock surface is marred by countless tiny scratches and clawmarks from the cell's smaller inhabitants, the rats. An unpainted ceramic pot with several chips and cracks sits in one corner of the cramped cell.

node.name: Arnshal Keep, Cell
node.description: The floor, made of cold, hard, and rough rock, is covered by a straw pallet. Iron manacles hang from the walls, and the rock surface is marred by countless tiny scratches and clawmarks from the cell's smaller inhabitants. An unpainted ceramic pot with several chips and cracks sits in one corner of the cramped cell.

node.name: Arnshal Keep, Cell
node.description: The floor, made of cold, hard, and rough rock, is covered by a straw pallet. Iron manacles hang from the walls, and the rock surface is marred by countless tiny scratches and clawmarks from the cell's smaller inhabitants, the rats. An unpainted ceramic pot with several chips and cracks sits in one corner of the cramped cell.

node.name: Arnshal Keep, Cell
node.description: The floor, made of cold, hard, and rough rock, is covered by a straw pallet. Iron manacles hang from the walls, and the rock surface is marred by countless tiny scratches and clawmarks from the cell's smaller inhabitants, the rats. An unpainted ceramic pot with several chips and cracks sits in one corner of the cramped cell.

node.name: Arnshal Keep, Cell
node.description: The floor, made of cold, hard, and rough rock, is covered by a straw pallet. Iron manacles hang from the walls, and the rock surface is marred by countless tiny scratches and clawmarks from the cell's smaller inhabitants, the rats. An unpainted ceramic pot with several chips and cracks sits in one corner of the cramped cell.

node.name: Zengmodaleth, Ancillary Rear Containment
node.description: A complex web of copper piping appears to cover the walls and ceiling, branching and merging as it traverses the length of the room. The elastic ground appears to be composed of a darkly dyed fiber woven with strips of rubber. Rippling blue and green light crackles throughout the area, strange shadows dancing around and emerging from the portal entrance. You note the smell of ozone and lubricating solvents, and the warm air is extremely dry.

node.name: Zengmodaleth, T-Junction
node.description: The piping appears to abruptly bend here, running south and east. A plaque made of polished oravir features a series of elemental symbols and a broad arrow pointing to the west, where the corridor appears to fade into a bright blue glow, the scent of oil thick in the air. At semi-regular intervals, a loud metallic groan echoes through the area, trailing off to a series of rapid pops and clicks.

node.name: Zengmodaleth, Elbow Bend
node.description: From the north, a thick structure of flattened framework is mounted above, and as it approaches the hallway bend, branches outward into hundreds of pipes that splay across the wall and ceiling. As the hallway continues, the piping runs through a series of access boxes, each encased in thick lead glass mounted on polished oravir hinges. Visible behind the plate glass are brilliantly coruscating bands of energy, pulsating as they stream across the interior of the access box. Sharp crackles and violent explosions can be heard to the north.

node.name: Zengmodaleth, Olkan Rae Audrus
node.description: The corridor abruptly ends, and you find yourself surrounded by an ephemeral bubble of blue energy, affording a view of an unfathomably vast metallic vertical structure composed of equal parts metal lattice, dodecahedrons crackling with electricity, and rippling spikes composed of pure energy. Occasional errant whips of electricity soar outward from the structure and rake along the surface of the bubble, filling the area with blinding white light and a piercing whine that descends in tone as the incredible energy is shunted elsewhere. Though only briefly visible as jagged arcs and lingering visual artifacts, the widening of the bolts as they cross from the column to your location suggests that the structure is unfathomably distant. The bubble ripples and flexes with each strike, and you realize that the bolts are incredibly large. In the distance, beyond the structure, there is simply emptiness.

node.name: Zengmodaleth, Jalmor Olkan
node.description: The hallway abruptly ends here, and the splayed piping bends to the ground where it seems to feed a large pool from which emerge half a dozen stacked columns about a Gor'Tog's height across. The pool is filled with a silvery-black liquid, and the columns crackle with energy and their surfaces churn as the strange fluid flows along narrow grooves etched along their sides. Arrayed along the ceiling are gaethzen orbs, casting a bright, even light across the area. A faint breeze swirls around, pushed by the motion of the fluid.

node.name: Plasma Vortex, Eastern Pylon
node.description: A softly glowing energy field pulses far above, behind which the pitch black and featureless sky is periodically crisscrossed with jagged bolts of filamentous lightning, unfurling in surges. Thunder rattles the area both immediately and with delays, clouding any sense of scale or distance. Ozone and lubricating solvents fill the air, and where the lightning strikes the field, blossoming sparks and ribbons of energy peel outward in mesmerizing displays. To the west, a caged sphere of rapidly spinning purple screeches, incessantly lashing against four curved pylons placed in an enclosing square.

node.name: Plasma Vortex, Southern Pylon
node.description: A softly glowing energy field pulses far above, behind which the pitch black and featureless sky is periodically crisscrossed with jagged bolts of filamentous lightning, unfurling in surges. Thunder rattles the area both immediately and with delays, clouding any sense of scale or distance. Ozone and lubricating solvents fill the air, and where the lightning strikes the field, blossoming sparks and ribbons of energy peel outward in mesmerizing displays. To the north, a caged sphere of rapidly spinning purple screeches, incessantly lashing against four curved pylons placed in an enclosing square. A narrow walkway extends to the south.

node.name: Plasma Vortex, Western Pylon
node.description: A softly glowing energy field pulses far above, behind which the pitch black and featureless sky is periodically crisscrossed with jagged bolts of filamentous lightning, unfurling in surges. Thunder rattles the area both immediately and with delays, clouding any sense of scale or distance. Ozone and lubricating solvents fill the air, and where the lightning strikes the field, blossoming sparks and ribbons of energy peel outward in mesmerizing displays. To the east, a caged sphere of rapidly spinning purple screeches, incessantly lashing against four curved pylons placed in an enclosing square.

node.name: Plasma Vortex, Northern Pylon
node.description: A softly glowing energy field pulses far above, behind which the pitch black and featureless sky is periodically crisscrossed with jagged bolts of filamentous lightning, unfurling in surges. Thunder rattles the area both immediately and with delays, clouding any sense of scale or distance. Ozone and lubricating solvents fill the air, and where the lightning strikes the field, blossoming sparks and ribbons of energy peel outward in mesmerizing displays. To the south, a caged sphere of rapidly spinning purple screeches, incessantly lashing against four curved pylons placed in an enclosing square.

node.name: Access Passage, Narrow Walkway
node.description: Barely wide enough to comfortably -- let alone safely -- walk across, the narrow bridge is build from wire-wrapped bars of silvery plated steel sunk into thick ceramic discs. A single, thin silver cable railing provides slim security as one crosses the bridge. Spanning a wide valley between the raging purple storm to the north and a blocky structure to the south, the overpass appears to be the only means across the divide, which stretches to the horizon to both the east and the west. Errant gusts of dry air blast in random directions, carrying the scent of scorched metal, and a seething glow vibrates an indistinguishable distance below the walkway.

node.name: Access Passage, Middle of the Divide
node.description: Though fairly rigid, the narrow bridge sways slightly at this point, the cable railing bowing noticeably. The air is warmer here, an upwelling of buoyant air providing a slight breeze. To the far north, a purple storm rages atop a large platform, and to the far south, the bridge appears to enter a blocky structure.

node.name: Access Passage, Scador li Darva
node.description: The bridge seamlessly merges with the large building directly beneath a circular entryway, with no ledge, window, or feature otherwise marking the perfectly smooth silver walls of the structure. An echoing reverberation can be heard deep within the building, a staccato pounding of metal on metal.

node.name: Scador li Darva, Entrance
node.description: An expansive facility sprawls to the south, enormous workshops pumping and churning strangely glowing sheets of crackling energy into bizarre and unrecognizable constructions. Rows of towering shelves hold perfect geometric forms bound in glossy silvery fiber, and a veritable army of custodians move in carefully choreographed service to the enterprise. A circular entryway is the sole disruption to an otherwise perfectly featureless wall to the north.

node.name: Scador li Darva, Static Looms
node.description: Dozens of looms are arrayed here, silvery metal framework holding filament thin glowing wires of the warp taut, heddles vibrating too fast to follow, weft carriers oscillating back and forth in a blur. Wound static fiber is delivered from below, the custodians ensuring a steady supply of the thread-like material for processing. Performing esoteric adjustments to the machines, the custodians gather the finished weave on thick rollers and carry the cloth deeper into the facility. To the southeast, a steady clanging of metal striking metal can be heard.

node.name: Scador li Darva, Ancillary Processing and Logistics
node.description: The focal point of the production to the north and above, the custodians gather processed materials and place them in a wide metal maw that regularly slams shut and opens, revealing an empty chamber. Nearby shelving units are emptied and almost immediately refilled, and the custodians ensure a steady stream of deliveries.

node.name: Scador li Darva, Arc Furnace
node.description: Dozens of furnaces are arrayed here, thick, paired discs of silvery coated metal wrapped in copper and cambrinth wire and mounted a few yards apart. The storms contained within are deafening, fed with glowing cables from below, pouring blindingly white liquid into channels for transport deeper into the facility. The custodians maintain the forges, adjusting power levels and throughput via interactions that defy understanding. To the southwest, a steady clanging of metal striking metal can be heard.

node.name: Scador li Darva, Piezoelectric Bellows
node.description: Thick sheets of white metal and ceramic are mounted between thick pylons, crossed with long torque struts protruding from the ground. Steadily pumping back and forth, the struts cause the sheets to flex. With each cycle of deformation the sheets crackle with electricity, which surges along the pylons and up to the furnaces above. The custodians tend to the assembly, ensuring smooth operation of the struts and proper contact of the sheets to the pylons.

node.name: Scador li Darva, Charge Distaffs
node.description: Tall, inverted threaded ceramic cones are mounted on rotating bases below spikes protruding from the ceiling. Fine, bristling clouds of branching lightning fan outward from the spikes and wind around the cones as static fiber. The custodians gather the filled distaffs and transport them upstairs for processing, ensuring a steady flow of material.

node.name: Ker'Leor, Forest Road
node.description: A wide dirt road runs parallel to the mountains from this clearing in the expansive forest. A soft breeze cools the area, dispersing clouds to reveal brilliant stars in the night sky.

node.name: Ker'Leor, Crevice
node.description: Cracks in the granite rock allow a few small shrubs to cling to the surrounding cliffs. Occasionally a pebble falls from above, the sound of it bouncing off the cliffs echoes throughout the crevice. The air has a slightly charged feel and the breeze carries a slight scorched scent.

node.name: Ker'Leor, Gorge
node.description: Steep rock walls split apart to enclose a narrow, forest-filled valley. Taking full advantage of the additional space, towering redwoods and pines stretch toward the stars. Bats flit amongst the trees.

node.name: Ker'Leor, Gorge
node.description: Sometime in the past a boulder crashed down from the cliffs and crushed a conifer, its trunk splintered and fallen to the ground. Insects are busily reclaiming the collapsed tree, burrowing and tunneling through the wood to return it to nature.

node.name: Ker'Leor, Gorge
node.description: Reaching for the sky, massive firs and pines tower over the dirt ground. Thick trunks growing close together make movement through the area difficult even before the dense underbrush is dealt with.

node.name: Ker'Leor, Gorge
node.description: Far overhead, coniferous trees reach for the sky filling the air with their green spires. The narrow valley twitters with bird calls as they flit amongst the branches. Underneath the scents of earth and sap is a faint tang of burning like the approach of a summer thunderstorm.

node.name: Ker'Leor, Gorge
node.description: Nestled in a small alcove is a tiny spring-fed pool surrounded by a grass-filled glade. Hoof and paw prints cover the muddy edges of the pond, evidence of the local wildlife's need for water.
